sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MID ,MER_TYPE ,MER_SYS_ID ,MER_NAME ,ACCOUNT_NUM ,ACCOUNT_NAME ,ACCOUNT_AGENCY_ID ,SETTLE_DATE ,SUM_AMT ,SUM_TRANS_FEE ,CLEAR_AMT ,CREATE_DATE ,CREATE_TIME ,CLEAR_STATUS ,CLEAR_ORDER_ID ,FAILE_AMT ,BP_SERIAL_NUMBER ,COUNT_FEE ,CLEAR_DESC ,RESERVED ,STOP_CLEAR_AMT FROM MER_SETTLE_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND MER_SETTLE_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MID) =#mid#
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NUM) Like '%'||(#account_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_AGENCY_ID) Like '%'||(#account_agency_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_AMT) Like '%'||(#sum_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_TRANS_FEE) Like '%'||(#sum_trans_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_AMT) Like '%'||(#clear_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#clear_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FAILE_AMT) Like '%'||(#faile_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BP_SERIAL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#bp_serial_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COUNT_FEE) Like '%'||(#count_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_DESC) Like '%'||(#clear_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STOP_CLEAR_AMT) =#stop_clear_amt#
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_SETTLE_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND MER_SETTLE_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MID) =#mid#
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NUM) Like '%'||(#account_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_AGENCY_ID) Like '%'||(#account_agency_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_AMT) Like '%'||(#sum_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_TRANS_FEE) Like '%'||(#sum_trans_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_AMT) Like '%'||(#clear_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#clear_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FAILE_AMT) Like '%'||(#faile_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BP_SERIAL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#bp_serial_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COUNT_FEE) Like '%'||(#count_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_DESC) Like '%'||(#clear_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STOP_CLEAR_AMT) =#stop_clear_amt#
